title: Project Scaffold + CLI + SysStat Health Check
goals: Initialize git repository
Create full project scaffold matching OCTANE_4_PHASE_PLAN_v2.md structure
Set up pyproject.toml with all dependencies
Implement config.py with Pydantic Settings
Implement structlog logging
Create all Pydantic models (AgentRequest, AgentResponse, SynapseEvent, TaskDAG)
Implement BaseAgent ABC with timing, error handling, Synapse event emission
Implement SynapseEventBus (in-memory)
Implement BodegaInferenceClient (async httpx â†’ :44468)
Implement BodegaIntelClient (async httpx â†’ :1111, :8030, :8032)
Create all 5 agent stubs (Web, Code, Memory, SysStat, P&L) with sub-agent stubs
Implement SysStat Agent with live Monitor (psutil) + ModelManager (Bodega)
Implement OSA skeleton: Orchestrator, Decomposer, Router, Evaluator, Policy, Guard
Build CLI with Typer + Rich: health, ask, trace, agents, version
Get 'octane health' working with real system metrics

working_commands: octane health â€” Shows RAM/CPU metrics + Bodega server status (LIVE)
octane ask '<query>' â€” Routes through OSA â†’ Decomposer â†’ Agent (stubs)
octane agents â€” Lists all 5 registered agents
octane trace â€” Shows Synapse trace (in-memory, per-process)

architecture_decisions: Python 3.13 venv (from sandbox/oct_env) since system Python is 3.9
SynapseEventBus is in-memory for Phase 1 â€” will move to Redis Streams later
Decomposer uses keyword-based heuristics for Phase 1 â€” will use big model later
All agent stubs return placeholder responses â€” ready to be filled in
BaseAgent.run() wraps execute() with timing + Synapse events automatically
Config via pydantic-settings reads from .env file
structlog configured with console renderer for dev, JSON option for prod

tested_flows.result: Shows live RAM (6.2/16.0 GB), CPU (14.6%), Bodega status (error â€” server not running)

tested_flows.command: octane ask 'What is NVIDIA stock price?'
tested_flows.result: Decomposer classifies as finance â†’ routes to Web Agent stub. 7 Synapse events traced.
Decomposer classifies as code â†’ routes to Code Agent stub. Full trace.
Lists all 5 agents (web, code, memory, sysstat, pnl) as registered

next_session.title: OSA + Bodega Inference â€” 'octane ask' with real LLM responses
goals: Connect OSA.Decomposer to Bodega Inference for LLM-powered decomposition
Make 'octane ask "hello"' return a real LLM response through the full OSA pipeline
Implement proper Evaluator with LLM-powered synthesis
Add SysStat to OSA flow â€” check model status before inference
Wire up Synapse trace to work across 'ask' + 'trace' in same process (or persist to file)
Add 'octane chat' REPL for multi-turn conversation
